title: 1000th win!
body: So Princess Yaia and I have finally reached 999 normal wins and we were hoping that maybe we could get a Riot party going for what will either be our 1000th win or a spectacular defeat! So if any of you see this and are free in a couple hours to play with us that'd be great!

replies.body: GG WP, ty for the carry. Still learning the lightning ninja {{champion:85}}

Thanks to Maraudaur, Gehirn and Mindstar for a great game! :) Got my 2nd M7 token :3

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/135355440/200381824?tab=overview
